nodes.text: Rihn Utrila was a Force-sensitive Twi'lek who was the triplet of Dai Utrila and Koya Utrila, and a servant to the Hutt Popara Anjiliac Diresto. Following Popara's death in 19 ABY, Utrila and her sisters entered the service of Popara's son Mika Anjiliac Chiera, and she became addicted to the spice Tempest.
